Another day, another integration - today we’re happy to announce you can query the geocoding API via the Ruby geokit gem. So no excuses rubyists - you can now use geokit, ruby-geocoder, or our own opencage-geocoder gem. So no excuses, get geocoding.

If ruby isn’t your thing fear not, we also have libraries for many other languages, and of course welcome contributions for all languages we don’t yet cover.

happy geocoding,

Ed
